#summary Prior Art

= Introduction =

In this page we document any prior art regarding keyboard layout editors.

= Completely unsorted list =
 
 * [http://www.freedesktop.org/wiki/Software/XKeyboardConfig xkeyboard-config project], with links to documentation, developer website.
  * [http://webcvs.freedesktop.org/xkeyboard-config/xkeyboard-config/symbols/ keyboard layout files]
 * [http://scripts.sil.org/cms/scripts/page.php?site_id=nrsi&item_id=KeymanVsMSKLC Comparing Keyman Developer and Microsoft Keyboard Layout Creator]
 * [http://scripts.sil.org/cms/scripts/page.php?site_id=nrsi&item_id=KeymanIPATutorial Creating layouts with Keyman, walkthrough to Keyman layout format]
 * [http://wordherd.com/keyboards/ Convert/create layouts through web tool(OSX specific?)]
 * [http://benleivian.wordpress.com/2006/04/24/keyboard-viewer/ Keyboard view utility in OS/X]
 * [http://blogs.msdn.com/michkap/archive/tags/Keyboards/default.aspx Michael Kaplan's blog (around MS Layout Creator)]
  * [http://blogs.msdn.com/michkap/archive/2006/01/16/513088.aspx one codepoint per SGCAPS]
 * [http://scripts.sil.org/cms/scripts/page.php?site_id=nrsi&item_id=SILKeyboards Keyman sample layouts from sil.org]
 * [http://scripts.sil.org/cms/scripts/page.php?site_id=nrsi&item_id=keylayoutmaker Perl script, from simple format creates OS/X .keylayout XML layout files]
 * [http://www.open-std.org/jtc1/sc35/wg1/docs/projects#24757 
ISO/IEC 24757 Information technology Keyboard interaction model, machine-readable description and interaction of keyboard keys]

 * Different layout formats
  # XKB
  # SCIM

  # OS/X XML format. [http://developer.apple.com/technotes/tn2002/tn2056.html link/dtd]
  # Windows binary format. link?, spec?
